person.bio: I am tech-savy, an entrepeneur since 2005 with several start-ups in the past subsequentially started. Furthermore I like dynamic environments due to my own nature and have excellent negotiating and sales skills. Able to build solid teams and display and execute my vision.
person.excerpt: An entrepeneur since 2005 with several start-ups in the past subsequentially started.
